typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{$dtid} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		EMT as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		PowerOn as string,
		ServoName as string,
		PowerOnTm as string,
		CuttingTm as string,
		CycleRunTm as string,
		CurrenttoolNo as string,
		MaxAxisNo as string,
		UseAxisNo as string,
		CNCMode as string,
		MainProgram as string,
		NowProgram as string,
		ProgramStep as string,
		Singlenote as string,
		Programnote as string,
		EventTime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> srccncstatus
srccncstatus sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Column_20 as string,
		Column_21 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'partition-data.csv') ~> PartitionDataSetCDM
